SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_active = '1' order by rand() limit 3
SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_active, g_code FROM m_greenbia_product

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(g_lcate, '전체') g_lcate, COUNT(*) as total FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_active = 1 GROUP BY g_lcate WITH ROLLUP ) test ORDER BY FIELD(g_lcate, '전체', '일반영양식', '전문영양식', '연하식', '건강식품' );

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관
급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_active = 1 ORDER BY g_display_order asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관
급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark, CASE WHEN g_mcate = '일반영양식' THEN 'normal1' WHEN g_mcate = '어린이 일반영양식' THEN 'normal2' END AS g_check FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_lcate = '일반영양식' AND g_active = 1 ORDER BY g_display_order asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, substring(g_mcate,2, LENGTH(g_mcate)) AS Mcate, g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관
급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark, CASE WHEN g_mcate = '당뇨 환자를 위한 전문영양식' THEN 'expert1' WHEN g_mcate = '신장 질환자를 위한 전문영양식' THEN 'expert2' WHEN g_mcate = '장이 민감한 환자를 위한 전문영양식' THEN 'expert3' WHEN g_mcate = '외상 및 수술환자식' THEN 'expert4' WHEN g_mcate = '단일영양식' THEN 'expert5' WHEN g_mcate = 'TF/RTH' THEN 'expert6' WHEN g_mcate = '고단백식' THEN 'expert7' END AS g_check FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_lcate = '전문영양식' AND g_active = 1 ORDER BY g_display_order asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관
급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark, CASE WHEN g_mcate = '점도증진제' THEN 'soft1' END AS g_check FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_lcate = '연하식' AND g_active = 1 ORDER BY g_display_order asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관
급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark, CASE WHEN g_mcate = '균형영양음료' THEN 'health1' WHEN g_mcate = '건강기능식품' THEN 'health2' END AS g_check FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_lcate = '건강식품' AND g_active = 1 ORDER BY g_display_order asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, CASE WHEN g_lcate = '전문영양식' THEN substring(g_mcate,1,LENGTH(g_mcate))ELSE g_mcate END AS g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_active = 1 AND (g_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR g_lcate like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR g_mcate like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR g_eating_way like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')) ORDER BY g_display_order asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_lcate, CASE WHEN g_lcate = '전문영양식' THEN substring(g_mcate,1,LENGTH(g_mcate))ELSE g_mcate END AS g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, CASE WHEN g_tube = '1' THEN '경관급식' ELSE '' END AS g_tubeMark FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_active = 1 AND (g_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR g_lcate like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR g_mcate like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR g_eating_way like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')) ORDER BY g_display_order2 asc

SELECT g_idx, g_name, g_code, g_keyword, g_lcate, case when g_lcate = '전문영양식' then substring(g_mcate,1,LENGTH(g_mcate)) else g_mcate end as g_mcate, g_contents, g_tube, g_capacity, g_cal, case when g_tube = '1' then '경관
급식' else '' end as g_tubeMark FROM m_greenbia_product WHERE g_name != '' And g_active = '1' ORDER BY g_display_order asc
